description: Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii 'Pygruzam' PYGMY RUBY) is an amazing plant species because of its unique, vibrant coloring and its ability to thrive in most climates. Its bright ruby foliage is spectacular year-round, and it offers a range of seasonal benefits; in spring, it produces yellow flowers that attract birds and butterflies, while in fall its small scarlet berries provide food and shelter for wildlife. It has a low, compact habit, making it an ideal choice for rock gardens, foundation plantings, borders, and container gardens. It is low maintenance, drought-tolerant, and able to resist most pest and disease problems, making it a reliable choice for any garden.
